results.name: Parity of Greedy Catalan Base representation for n: a(n) = A014418(n) reduced modulo 2.
comment: Also the rightmost digit in Catalan Base Representation A014418.
Characteristic function for A244223, numbers which have an "odd" representation in Greedy Catalan Base.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4862
program: print([a(n)%2 for n in range(101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 08 2017
xref: Binary complement: A244220. Partial sums: A244225.
A244226 gives the lengths of runs of identical terms. A244227 the lengths of runs of zeros.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 23 2014
